properties.Title: Park
properties.Description: Set next to a lake, this casual hotel is surrounded by the forested hills of Shawnee State Park.Wood-paneled rooms have minifridges, satellite TV and private balconies. Rustic 2-bedroom cottages have living rooms with gas log fireplaces, dining areas, and fully equipped kitchens, plus screened-in porches and charcoal grills. Some have hot tubs on the porches.The hotel offers a restaurant, a business center and 7 meeting rooms. Leisure facilities include indoor and outdoor pools, a hot tub, a sauna and an 18-hole golf course, as well as tennis, volleyball and basketball courts.

properties.Title: Parking
properties.Description: Parking lot next to road and across from Turkey Creek Lake

properties.Title: Parking
properties.Location: Parking Lot and Access to Beach Area
properties.Description: Parking lot with access to lake beach and swimming area.  Restroom facilities here.

properties.Title: Camping
properties.Description: Camping, canoe, kayak and paddle boat rental.  Beach area for swimming.  Restroom facilities.

properties.Title: Shelter
properties.Description: Shelter and restrooms available.  Entrance across road to Look Out Trail.  Boat and kayak access to Roosevelt lake.

properties.Title: Park
properties.Description: Picnic shelters, splash pad, playground, disc golf, restroom facilities, tennis courts, cross country course, and mountain bike course.

properties.Title: POI
properties.Description: Hike up to the top of Raven Rock.  No dogs.  Permit required.

properties.Title: Park
properties.Location: Gladys Riley Golden Star Lily Preserve
properties.Description: Arc of Appalachia preserve featuring 1.0 mile Yellow Buckeye Trail (difficult) and 1.25 mile White Walnut Trail (moderate). Dogs not permitted on trails

properties.Title: Park
properties.Description: State Park Nature Center provides interpretative education and allows public to touch or hold local wildlife
